Specimen Type: CNS tissue samples (brain, spinal cord, peripheral nerve)
Purpose: To analyze autopsy-derived CNS tissue for neurological disease or abnormalities, providing accurate and reproducible diagnostic information.
Container: Leak-proof container with 10% neutral buffered formalin
Equipment: Histopathology laboratory equipment (tissue processor, microtome, light microscope, electron microscope, PCR/sequencing instruments)
